description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Settings***.
2. Click on ***Edit system mails***.
3. Select the desired appointment booking calendar.
4. Click on ***Confirmation***.
5. Check the box if you want the appointment confirmation to be sent by SMS as well.
6. Click on ***save now***.
title: Appointment confirmation by sms
